snippet: An Oklahoma prosecutor has filed notification that he will seek the death penalty against a man accused of beheading a woman at a food processing plant.
lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma prosecutor has filed notification that he will seek the death penalty against a man accused of beheading a woman at a food processing plant.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Death Penalty Sought in Beheading
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Death Penalty Sought In Beheading
